channel.title: My Zartye Bow [Need Fixing]
channel.description:
Okay so I looked around for a Zartye Bow Model. I found it but there are a few problems i'm noticing. When I fire it It's really close ranged with even the "LongRange" Combat Style? How do I Fix This? Another thing I would like is if my Zartye Bow could 1. Shoot Faster 2. Have a "Dark Bow" Spec 3. Shoot two arrows at once.
If anyone could please & kindly help me i'd appriciate it.

item.title: My Zartye Bow [Need Fixing]
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

Open up Player.java. Search:

public static final int[] BOWS =

And you will see a huge list of IDs. Add your bow to the list like this:

public static final int[] BOWS = {YourbowIDhere,9185,839,845,847,851,855,859,841,843,849,853,857,861,4212,4214,4215,11235,4216,4217,4218,4219,4220,4221,4222,4223,6724,4734,4934,4935,4936,4937};

Replace the YourbowIDhere with your bow ID.

For Special attack you can just read one of the ‘‘How to add special attack’’ - guide.

Seems like you want to make it pretty much like dark bow itself.
You can just go into your client files and label dark bow with zaryte bow’s model.

Read full topic
